dogs.name: Cookie
dogs.description: Sweet Cookie would love to meet you! She is a charmer and can't get enough of being around people. She will be a wonderful companion. Just two years old, she is spayed, vaccinated, and ready to find her family.

dogs.name: Buddy
dogs.description: Buddy is a mellow and social boy! He has a loving temperment and is ready to be your new best friend.

dogs.name: Tucker
dogs.description: Tucker would do best in a quiet home. He would love a confident companion dog sibling to help him come out of his reserved shell. He has been living in foster care and is ready for a new loving home that he can call his own.

dogs.name: Bandit
dogs.description: Bandit is friendly, loves treats, and is food driven. Happy all the time and would do well with other dogs of all sizes. Bandit is ready for her forver home!

dogs.name: Max
dogs.description: Max is looking for a home where he can be a playmate for another pet as he will do best with a friend. He is gregarious, outgoing, and loves outdoor play time!
